title: Watch: Here's What It Sounds Like When You Play Metal On A Sitar [News]
text: @ User Post a comment You should try a Portuguese band named The Firstborn. They use sitar both live and in studio for a new layer of guitars. 2 Oh my god, thank you, it kinda reminds me to Zaum mixed with the newer Gojira stuff 0 Ustad Vilayat Khan is rolling in his grave 1 I suddenly want a sitar. 0 maybe it's because i've been listening to Sleep and Om a lot, but i prefer the tampura. love that droning, endless, wall of sound 0
